message: Yes...Democrats decided to give a free pass to Pres. Iraq War fiasco and feeding false info and Intel to ALL Abu-Graib Halliburton FEMA and Hurricane Catrina And Pres. Bush waiting 4 days to send ships to NOLA after. Blackwater and NOLA The fact that Pres. Bush and Dick Chenney committed war crimes and also crimes against humanity by lying about the reasons for war. Maybe Democrats should remember the next time the GOP do something that is really reckless like ignore warnings and intell regarding an eminent terrorist attack given by the outgoing administration . Maybe we should speak up more on how GOP refused the funds to step up Benghazi and other embassy's security...

Remarkable, the indigenous Africans in their native Egypt with cradles of civilisation over 10,000 years ago along the African River Nile - language, writing, science, engineering & culture. And most importantly the associated social engineering to achieve civilisation whilst most of the rest of the world were eking out a living as barbaric nomadic hunters & gatherers. Alien incursions & invasions starting with the Italian Roman Natives, Persian Natives, Arab Natives, & Western European Natives have all but destroyed the nucleus of civilization & the once great Native Africans.
